name: quantbot
description: Advanced Telegram bot for trading simulation, CA monitoring, and PNL analysis using Birdeye API and Helius WebSockets

scripts.build:ordered: pnpm --filter @quantbot/core build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/utils build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/storage build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/observability build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/api-clients build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/ohlcv build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/analytics build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/jobs build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/ingestion build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/data-observatory build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/simulation build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/workflows build && pnpm --filter @quantbot/api build && pnpm -r --filter './packages/*' --filter '!@quantbot/core' --filter '!@quantbot/utils' --filter '!@quantbot/storage' --filter '!@quantbot/observability' --filter '!@quantbot/api-clients' --filter '!@quantbot/ohlcv' --filter '!@quantbot/analytics' --filter '!@quantbot/jobs' --filter '!@quantbot/ingestion' --filter '!@quantbot/data-observatory' --filter '!@quantbot/simulation' --filter '!@quantbot/workflows' --filter '!@quantbot/api' build
scripts.build:incremental: tsc --build --force packages/core/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/utils/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/storage/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/observability/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/api-clients/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/ohlcv/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/analytics/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/jobs/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/ingestion/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/simulation/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/workflows/tsconfig.json && tsc --build packages/cli/tsconfig.json
scripts.build:force: cd packages/core && tsc --build --force && cd ../utils && tsc --build --force && cd ../storage && tsc --build --force && cd ../observability && tsc --build --force && cd ../api-clients && tsc --build --force && cd ../ohlcv && tsc --build --force && cd ../analytics && tsc --build --force && cd ../ingestion && tsc --build --force && cd ../..
scripts.test:unit: vitest run packages/**/tests/unit/**/*.test.ts packages/**/tests/unit/**/*.spec.ts packages/**/*.test.ts packages/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:stress:all: RUN_DB_STRESS=1 RUN_CHAOS_TESTS=1 RUN_INTEGRATION_STRESS=1 vitest run --config vitest.stress.config.ts
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm test

author: QuantBot Team
